markdownRemark.html:
It took me a while to figure out how to position an image tag or video tag. I was first playing around with divs only to realize there is an easy way how to position image or video tag directly

img{

display: block;

margin-right: auto;

width: 50%

}

video {

margin-left: auto;

margin-right: auto;

display: block

}
